Shaan Batra

essays poetry investing coding
Bitcoin | Lightning | Nostr

False Love

October 2019

Love is just a word
A command of bondage

 Between master and servant
Parent and obedient child
Owner and obedient dog
Husband and obedient wife

True Love
cannot be issued
Nor summoned  

It cannot exist
On an uneven plane

It is simply that
which flows freely
between equal spirits
